title: Ticket #4330: Download graphs: break out manual/rpm/debs in data
description:
For the download graphs, it would be nice if the data was available separated by "Went through the download script (and thus is highly trustworthy)", "RPMs" and "DEBs". The of interest is because we know automated processes are mirroring our RPMs and DEBs, inflating the numbers. For example, 7.6 was taken off the web site in July of 2013, but we're still getting about 5,000 downloads of 7.6 a month through the RPM repository. http://research.cs.wisc.edu/htcondor/developers/graphs/

Maybe just create a new CSV with the additional data so people who want to experiment with it can.
creator: adesmet
